EmailTemplate.description: This is send to Staffing Associate record owner assessment confirmation is not sent
EmailTemplate.name: SF to Staffing Associate assessment confirmation email not sent
EmailTemplate.subject: Error: assessment confirmation email was not sent
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!HR_Event__c.OwnerFirstName},
The assessment confirmation email that you just tried to send to {!HR_Event_Attendance__c.Applicant_Name__c} did not go through. There are two possible reasons for this:
1) There is information missing on the HR Event 2) You have tried to send an assessment confirmation for a training event.
Please click on this link to check the related HR Event: {!HR_Event__c.Link} If the HR Event type is "Training Event", you should tick the "Send training confirmation email" checkbox.
Once you have verified the information, you can resend the confirmation email.
Thanks,
Central Operations
This is a standard email, sent automatically when someone tries to send a assessment confirmation email without the required information.
